attributes.comment:
My sister and her husband have been trying to get pregnant and after being
unsuccessful, they have decided to adopt a little girl from China. These children
need loving homes. So I have to question the idea of raising the fees. It only
makes is hard for these soon to be parents to complete thier famlies. They need
to be buying furniture and clothes for their little ones, not spending it on your over
priced fees. Please take in to consideration what these candidates already have
to go through to get the forms they need to complete this journey. Its absolutely
absurd to raise the fees one-hundred dollar or more for a peice of paper that costs
a penny.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Denise Solomon
